review_data.title: Great pizza, pleasant atmosphere
review_data.content: Dropping by for a quick lunch on a weekday. Friendly welcome by staff, prompt order taking. Great pizza, nice atmosphere in vintage decorated restaurant area, staff accommodating as much as possible to customer wishes. Restaurant can be highly recommended. Hope to be back soon.
